verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: After a speech at the National Federation of Independent Business on Tuesday] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: walked] [ARGM-DIR: across the stage] and hugged the American flag . Again .

[ARGM-TMP: After a speech at the National Federation of Independent Business on Tuesday] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] walked across the stage and [V: hugged] [ARG1: the American flag] . [ARGM-DIS: Again] .
